summary: A woman living in a large country home drives her servants to mutiny with her outrageous demands as she waits for death to come for her.
cast: Marlies Heuer|Gene Bervoets|Annet Malherbe|Eva van de Wijdeven|Gijs Naber|Alex van Warmerdam|Marwan Kenzari
keywords: death|vomiting|boat on fire|written and directed by cast member|bully
title: De laatste dagen van Emma Blank
